languages.text: Таково было эхо деяний Вольного Торговца из династии фон Валанциус. Деяний, что изменили Простор Коронус и предуготовили его к событиям еще более мрачным и кровопролитным. Но то — события совсем иной истории, а эта подходит к концу.

Such was the echo of the deeds of the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. Deeds that transformed the Koronus Expanse and prepared it for events even darker and more violent. But those are the events of a different story. This one has come to an end.
languages.original_text: Таково было эхо деяний Вольного Торговца из династии фон Валанциус. Деяний, что изменили Простор Коронус и предуготовили его к событиям еще более мрачным и кровопролитным. Но то — события совсем иной истории, а эта подходит к концу.

traits.locale_text: Such was an echo of deeds, done by Rogue Trader from the von Vlancius dynasty. The deeds that transformed the Koronus Expanse, and prepared it for the events even more dark and violent. But those are events for another story. And this story comes to an end.

Such was an echo of deeds, done by Rogue Trader from the von Vlancius dynasty. The deeds that transformed the Koronus Expanse, and prepared it for the events even more dark and violent. But those are events for another story. And this story comes to an end.

Such was the echo of the deeds of the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Deeds that transformed the Expanse and prepared it for events even darker and more violent. But those are the events of a different story. This one has come to an end.

Such was the echo of the deeds of the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Deeds that transformed the Expanse and prepared it for events even darker and more violent. But those are the events of a different story. This one has come to an end.

Such was the echo of the deeds of the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. Deeds that transformed the Koronus Expanse and prepared it for events even darker and more violent. But those are the events of a different story. This one has come to an end.

Such was the echo of the deeds of the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. Deeds that transformed the Koronus Expanse and prepared it for events even darker and more violent. But those are the events of a different story. This one has come to an end.

languages.text: 上述记录便是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的行商浪人的所作所为造成的影响。这些事迹彻底改变了科罗努斯扩区，为更黑暗、更血腥的事件拉开了序幕，不过那已经是另一个故事了。至于当下的故事，已经迎来了尾声。
languages.original_text: Such was the echo of the deeds of the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. Deeds that transformed the Koronus Expanse and prepared it for events even darker and more violent. But those are the events of a different story. This one has come to an end.

traits.locale_text: 上述记录便是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的行商浪人的所作所为造成的影响。这些事迹彻底改变了科罗努斯扩区，为更黑暗、更血腥的事件拉开了序幕，不过那已经是另一个故事了。至于当下的故事，已经迎来了尾声。

languages.text: Das war das Echo der Taten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} des Hauses Valancius. Taten, welche die Koronus-Ausdehnung veränderten und sie auf noch dunklere und brutalere Ereignisse vorbereiteten. Doch das sind die Ereignisse einer anderen Geschichte. Diese hat nun ihr Ende gefunden.
languages.original_text: Such was the echo of the deeds of the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. Deeds that transformed the Koronus Expanse and prepared it for events even darker and more violent. But those are the events of a different story. This one has come to an end.

traits.locale_text: Das war das Echo der Taten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} der Dynastie Valancius. Taten, welche die Ausdehnung veränderten und sie auf noch dunklere und brutalere Ereignisse vorbereiteten. Doch das sind die Ereignisse einer anderen Geschichte. Diese hat nun ihr Ende gefunden.

languages.text: Tel fut l'écho des actes {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} de la dynastie von Valancius. Son influence transforma les Étendues de Koronus et les prépara à des événements encore plus sombres et violents, mais il s'agit là d'une tout autre histoire. Celle {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} s'achève ici.
languages.original_text: Such was the echo of the deeds of the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. Deeds that transformed the Koronus Expanse and prepared it for events even darker and more violent. But those are the events of a different story. This one has come to an end.

traits.locale_text: Tel fut l'écho des actes {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} de la dynastie von Valancius. Son influence transforma les Étendues et les prépara à des événements encore plus sombres et plus violents, mais il s’agit là d’une autre histoire. Celle {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} s'achève ici.

languages.text: Tal era el eco de las proezas de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de la casa von Valancius. Proezas que transformaron la Extensión de Koronus y la prepararon para eventos aún más oscuros y violentos... pero esa es otra historia. Esta ha llegado a su final.
languages.original_text: Such was the echo of the deeds of the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. Deeds that transformed the Koronus Expanse and prepared it for events even darker and more violent. But those are the events of a different story. This one has come to an end.

traits.locale_text: Tal era el eco de las proezas de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de la dinastía von Valancius. Proezas que transformaron la Extensión y la prepararon para eventos aún más oscuros y violentos... pero esa es otra historia. Esta ha llegado a su final.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス家の自由開拓者の行いが呼び起こした反響は大きなものだった。コロヌス・エクスパンスを変貌させ、より暗く、より暴力的な出来事への準備をさせた。しかし、それは別の物語での出来事だ。この物語はすでに終わりを告げている。
languages.original_text: Such was the echo of the deeds of the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. Deeds that transformed the Koronus Expanse and prepared it for events even darker and more violent. But those are the events of a different story. This one has come to an end.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス家の自由開拓者の行いが呼び起こした反響は大きなものだった。コロヌス・エクスパンスを変貌させ、より暗く、より暴力的な出来事への準備をさせた。しかし、それは別の物語での出来事だ。この物語はすでに終わりを告げている。

languages.text: Von Valancius Hanesi Hür Taciri'nin yaptıkları böyle yankı buldu. Eylemleri, Koronus Enginliği'nde bir dönüşümün yaşanmasını sağladı ve onu çok daha karanlık, çok daha şiddetli bazı olaylara hazırladı. Bu olayların neler olduğu ise farklı bir öykünün konusu. Bu öykü, burada sona eriyor.
languages.original_text: Such was the echo of the deeds of the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. Deeds that transformed the Koronus Expanse and prepared it for events even darker and more violent. But those are the events of a different story. This one has come to an end.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius Hanesi Hür Tacir'inin gerçekleştirdiği eylemlerin yankıları bu şekildeydi. Bu eylemler, Koronus Enginliği'nde bir dönüşüm yaşanmasını sağladı ve onu çok daha karanlık, çok daha şiddetli bazı olaylara hazırladı. Ancak bu olayların neler olduğu, farklı bir hikâyenin konusu. Bu hikâye ise burada sona eriyor.
